DataElement.preferredName: Diagnosis Text Pathology Report Diagnostic Procedure Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text area for manual documentation of information from cytology and histopathology reports.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Manual documentation of information from cytology and histopathology reports.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

Property.preferredDefinition: The description of cells and tissues made by a pathologist based on microscopic evidence, and sometimes used to make a diagnosis of a disease.

Concepts.definition: A report that provides a description of the gross and microscopic examination of the specimen and is used to make a diagnosis and to determine treatment. It defines which structures and organs of the body are involved by the tumor, verifies the primary site of the cancer and describes the extent to which it has spread.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

DataElementConcept.origin: NAACCR:North American Association of Central Cancer Registries

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Methods, procedures, and tests performed to diagnose disease, disordered function, or disability._Text; the words of something written.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual entities required by NCI operations and systems. Includes administrative, financial, organizational and quasi-scientific concepts required for NCI operations and systems.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Methods, procedures, and tests performed to diagnose disease, disordered function, or disability.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure or test to diagnose a disease or disorder.

ClassificationSchemes.longName: Division of Cancer Control and Population Sciences

ReferenceDocuments.name: Version 12 Updated Instructions
